title: The Ukraine War And Energy Crisis
itunes:title: The Ukraine War And Energy Crisis
description:
Aggi Cantrill, TV producer with Bloomberg News, discusses the Ukraine war and the latest updates on the fighting. Randy Schwimmer, Co-head of Senior Lending at Churchill Asset Management, talks about markets and the economy amid global uncertainty and economic pressures. Maryam Brown, President of Southern California Gas Company, talks about the energy market and gas supplies amid the Russia-Ukraine war. Mike McGlone, Senior Commodity Strategist with Bloomberg Intelligence, joins the show to discuss the latest cryptocurrency news. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Taylor Riggs.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
